text: Rieneke Verheijen-Demming (born 15 May 1946 in Terwolde) is a Dutch former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s and 1970s. Demming represented her nation twice at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women. In 1970, finishing 8th overall and In 1971, finishing 29th overall. She participated also at the European Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1970. Between 1967 and 1973 she competed seven times at the Dutch Allround Championships. Demming married speed skater Eddy Verheijen. Their oldest son, Carl Verheijen also became a speed skater, who has a relationship with speed skater Andrea Nuyt. Their other son Frank Verheijen, is a marathon skater. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:1946 births Category:People from Voorst Category:Dutch female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Rieneke Demming
